summary: The instrument cluster has stopped working. I am no longer able to view things such as speed, tire pressure, oil life, warning lights and signals and more.   This was functioning properly when I bought the truck but recently has gone blank for days and then came back on. It went out again about 5 days ago and has been out since.   I have researched he'd online and in message boards and have seen many other cases of this happening with other Ram trucks.
